member.name: IWICBitmapSource.CopyPalette
member.summary: Retrieves the color table for indexed pixel formats.
member.param: An . A palette can be created using the method.

returns.para: Returns one of the following values.

member.name: IWICBitmapSource.CopyPixels
member.summary: Instructs the object to produce pixels.
member.param: The rectangle to copy. A NULL value specifies the entire bitmap.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapSource.GetPixelFormat
member.summary: Retrieves the pixel format of the bitmap source..
member.param: Receives the pixel format GUID the bitmap is stored in. For a list of available pixel formats, see the Native Pixel Formats topic.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapSource.GetResolution
member.summary: Retrieves the sampling rate between pixels and physical world measurements.
member.param: A pointer that receives the x-axis dpi resolution.
A pointer that receives the y-axis dpi resolution.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapSource.GetSize
member.summary: Retrieves the pixel width and height of the bitmap.
member.param: A pointer that receives the pixel width of the bitmap.
A pointer that receives the pixel height of the bitmap
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWICBitmapSource
member.summary: Exposes methods that refers to a source from which pixels are retrieved, but cannot be written back to.
